UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Alanine and Lysine Scans of the LL-37-Derived Peptide Fragment KR-12 Reveal Key Residues for Antimicrobial Activity.
Literature.Author: Gunasekera S, Muhammad T, Strömstedt AA, Rosengren KJ, Göransson U

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=20µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=40µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=40µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=40µM)
